pageContext.claim: “Everybody agrees that ObamaCare doesn't work. Premiums & deductibles are far too high - Really bad HealthCare! Even the Dems want to replace it, but with Medicare for all, which would cause 180 million Americans to lose their beloved private health insurance.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump leaves out that this Medicare-for-all proposal from Democrats in theory would replace private insurance with government-funded plans. So the 180 million people on private plans through employers would not necessarily go without coverage. Furthermore, Democrats do not want to replace the Affordable Care Act. Although there are many cases of premiums and other costs rising sharply, key provisions of the law have allowed millions of people to access health insurance coverage.
